Easy to use applications using modern we.message: Programa mampiasa ny teknolojia farany amin’ny resaka web sady mora ampiasaina

Enjoy with faster and more reliable appl.message: Programa azo ianteherana tsara, mandeha amin’ny fitaovana rehetra, sady afaka ampiasaina na tsy misy internet aza

We are doing our best to secure our appl.message: Miezaka manao izay azonay atao izahay mba ho azo antoka tsara foana ny programa amboarinao, sy ny rakitra ampiasainao

Are we producing official applications f.message: Programa ofisialy natao ho an’ny Vavolombelon’i Jehovah ve no amboarinay?

No, we are not. You are free to choose w.message: Tsia. Afaka mifidy ianao na hampiasa an’ireo programa amboarinay ireo na tsia. Alohan’ny hampiasana azy ireo, dia tsara raha efa neken’ny anti-panahy rehetra izany. Ankoatra izany, dia fantatray koa fa maro amin’izao ny programa azonao ampiasaina mitovitovy amin’ny amboarinay. Tsy izahay mihitsy no hilaza hoe iza amin’izy ireny no tsara na ratsy. Mino izahay fa tsara sy manana ny mampiavaka azy daholo ireny programa ireny, nefa mitovy daholo ihany ny tanjona tiana hotratrarina.
